Description:
7% return - great investment
2 bedroom with a solid tenant paying $250pw .
The unit includes BIR's in the bedrooms, central bathroom, massive living, open plan kitchen / meals, separate laundry, large outdoor area / rear yard and a lock up garage.
Located at the back of a well maintained block of units that have long term residents and tenants, 100m from the closest bus stop and a short walk to schools and shops, the property is position perfect.
Secure your future by investing wisely in this great unit with massive returns that will not only beat the banks, but give your capital a chance to grow as well.
Dion Plumb : 0424 940 629

Description:
Beautiful Family Home
This beautiful home has been completely renovated from the front door to the back, simply move in and enjoy! With new carpets and fresh paint throughout there really is nothing more that needs to be done. The kitchen has been fully renovated which includes a breakfast bench, stainless steel cook-top, electric oven and dishwasher. The home comprises 3 good sized bedrooms all with BIRs, plus study or 4th bedroom, 2 separate living areas, separate formal dining room along with renovated family bathroom and ensuite. Add to this gas ducted heating and reverse cycle air conditioning make the home comfortable all year round. Outside has a double carport as well as a double garage and a wonderful entertainment area with plenty of room to sit, relax and watch the kids play.

Description:
Smart, Single Level & Secure
Ideal for those downsizing, starting out or investing, this single level unit with garden vistas has been meticulously maintained by its owners. Immaculately presented throughout, the spacious accommodation enjoys refurbished interiors, open plan kitchen/meals with garden views and ample bench space, 2 bedrooms both with birs, bathroom, laundry and separate powder room. Outside has a rear private courtyard, lovely landscaped garden space and is placed at the front of a complex of only two. The location has a bus stop close by, moments to Newcomb shopping and a few more to central Geelong.

First Home Buyers and Investors, Here It Is!!

Description:
Backyard oasis in time for summer!
On walking into this inviting family residence you can't help but feel at home, the sun filled living room with polished floorboards is bright and spacious and offers a lovely aspect out to the private backyard. That feeling continues into the separate kitchen and meals area which is complete with gas cooking, solid timber cabinetry and ample cupboard space. The main home comprises 3 generous bedrooms, two with built in robes, a gleaming renovated central bathroom and laundry with separate powder room. A bonus rumpus room with inbuilt bar and wood fire plus an additional fourth bedroom with built in robe offers flexibility and more than enough room to accommodate the whole family. The piece-de-resistance is the fully secure rear yard complete with semi-inground swimming pool and surrounding deck, perfect for summer entertaining while still allowing plenty of room to relax or play. Freshly painted throughout and featuring ducted heating, air-conditioning and ceiling fans for year round comfort, this home is surely not to be missed.
Lloyd Moulton : 0434 587 881

Think Big! The options for this 996sqm approx block are endless. Whether you choose to rent out, renovate, redevelop or even subdivide S.T.C.A, this is your opportunity to unlock the potential and reap the rewards that this property has to offer.
The existing dwelling consists of two light filled living areas, central kitchen with ample bench/ storage space, 3 bedrooms with BIRS and main bathroom. The home features a gas log fire, gas wall heater, air con in the main lounge, a brand new roof, carport, plus additional shedding that is ideal for storage or a workshop that includes an area for an office, studio or study..
Positioned in a quiet street, in close proximity to local shops, schools, recreational facilities and the Bellerine Peninsula
Rarely do opportunities like this come about. A purchase here will give you the opportunity to unlock massive capital for the future.

Description:
Meticulous Presentation
With meticulous attention to detail, this home offers you a quality finish and all the modern conveniences of family living. On entry you will be absorbed by the open plan light-filled living area. Comprising 3 bedrooms all with BIRs. Description:
A Winner for families!
This big welcoming home accommodates the growing family well. On a spacious 651sqm low maintenance corner block, the 3BR home is surrounded by established gardens with ample parking, garden shed and single garage accessed from a quiet court location. The solid brick home has been maintained well and immediately presents a bright and comfortable atmosphere as soon as you enter. The living areas are generously sized to provide separate formal and casual space to relax and entertain. There are two main living rooms and a dining room adjoining the kitchen. The practical light-filled kitchen has loads of storage space with cupboards and drawers, extensive bench space and stainless steel oven and cook top. Ceiling fans and split system heating and cooling have been installed in the kitchen and living areas, where the large alfresco can be accessed. The three bedrooms are positioned to the right of the entry, two of which have BIRs and the main bedroom boasting a WIR leading to a spotless ensuite. Adjacent is a separate family-sized bathroom. This is a terrific family home without the hefty price tag in a convenient location close to schools, parks and major shopping centres. Inspect today.
Craig Casey : 0459 048 098

Description:
Immaculate Home in Quiet Locale
This 7yr old Burbank home is beautifully maintained and is an opportunity in waiting for the savvy investor, first home buyer or downsizer.
A home contemporary in design is evident from the moment you step inside as you are welcomed by tiled floors which lead into a spacious master bedroom boasting carpet flooring, genuine walk in robe, large ensuite with glass screen shower and modern vanity with basin. A further two bedrooms are separated by an internal hallway which both offer built in robes, carpet flooring and share a central bathroom with shower, bath, vanity and basin with a separate toilet nearby.
Offering two living areas with one designed as a theatre room while the other adjoins the dining and kitchen with gas cook-top, electric oven, dishwasher and double sink with ample bench space and storage. Outdoors has a lush low maintenance yard with two water tanks and an undercover area great for entertaining all year round with the option to store a boat or caravan.
Additional features include; central heating, energy saving lighting and double remote garage with internal access.
Notable amenities within walking distance include medical centres, Aldi, Safeway, schools, childcare centres, public transport and is only a short drive to the coast within 30 minutes. Rental yield in the vicinity of $360 per week can be expected. An inspection will not disappoint!

Nest or Invest

Description:
OUTSTANDING ENTRY LEVEL BUYING.
Opportunity for an entry level purchase or investment option. This renovated unit, approx. six years ago, boasts ensuite bathroom from the bedroom with built in robes. Stylish kitchen that overlooks the living room, split system heating and cooling, separate laundry and single carport. Positioned in a handy location to schools, shops and public transport, offers the purchaser or investor to purchase this gem with nothing or little to do.

Description:
Picture Perfect - Space, Quality & Style
Be amazed by this impeccably presented and impressive home nestled in a quiet court. This picture perfect renovated home would be ideal for a first home buyer, investor or family home buyer looking for stylish low maintenance living or a savvy investment.
As you enter you are greeted by the fresh white paint creating a lovely contemporary feel throughout.
The free flowing floorplan offers three bedrooms with built in robes; master includes, ensuite, walk in robe, ceiling fan and modern pendant lights.
The modern bathroom is dressed by quality fittings coupled with an impressive colour palette, presented beautifully including bath, shower and a separate main toilet. The large living space flows through to the open dining and kitchen area. The kitchen accommodates a dishwasher and a substantial
cupboard storage and breakfast bar. The home also features ducted heating and split system cooling for your all year round weather needs.
The backyard boosts a fantastic undercover entertaining area that seamlessly combines with the manicured and well maintained backyard and offers great storage with a large garden shed.
Set on approximately 799 m2 this property generously ticks all the boxes.
This property is priced to sell, exceptional value. Enquire today!
Home Owner: “I love that it's located in such a quiet court, filled with great neighbours.”
Roncon Real Estate - An Agency like no other!
All stated dimensions and areas are approximate. Particulars herein are for information only and do not constitute representation by the Owner or Agent.
Jayden Roncon : 0416 200 715
